Capabilities

Full-service pipeline and oil & gas well roustabout company

East River Roustabout, LLC

East River emerged as a response to the frustrations experienced by our affiliate upstream operator. They observed that roustabout services were frequently treated as an afterthought, provided by unsafe, under-skilled, and under-capitalized service providers. These providers seemed more focused on maximizing profits for individual jobs rather than consistently delivering high-quality, safe performance for the essential small-scale tasks that arise day after day.

Leadership

With a combined 44 years of experience in pipeline and roustabout services, our team leaders, Richard Staton, Grady Briley, Tim Prince, and Miguel Tafoya, have a proven track record of success on projects for major energy companies such as DCP Midstream, EnLink Midstream, Teocalli Exploration, among many others.

All East River team leads possess the appropriate Operator Qualifications ("OQ") in Veriforce for tank battery, pipeline, and compressor station projects. East River is a member of Veriforce Compliance Pro and ISNetworld.

Safety

At East River Roustabout, LLC (ERR), our mission is to deliver high-quality services and ensure the well-being of our employees, clients, and community. We believe safety is a cornerstone of a successful organization. Our commitment to safety underscores every decision we make, from project planning to execution.

  • Safety First: We prioritize employee safety above all else.
  • Continuous Training: We believe in the continuous education of our staff to create a culture where safety is a shared responsibility.
  • Compliance: We adhere to all state, federal, and industry-specific safety regulations.
  • Accountability: We foster an environment where all employees feel empowered to report unsafe conditions and behavior.
  • Incident Prevention: We employ proactive safety measures to minimize hazards.
  • Community and Environmental Stewardship: We strive to minimize our ecological footprint while maintaining a safe operational zone.
  • Open Communication: We are committed to an open dialogue about safety concerns, performance metrics, and continuous improvement strategies.

By staying true to these core values, we maintain a safety record we're proud of. Our mission to create a safe, productive workplace is a commitment to each member of our team, our clients, and our community.

To date, East River has never had an incident or accident on our OSHA 300 logs. In ISNetworld, we maintain an A top safety rating. We also maintain an insurance experience modification rate of .84. This focus on safe operations results in affordable operations for East River, and we are able to pass that affordability on to our customers.
